CHAPTER 1 - LAUNCH

It was a summer day on Kerbin, the I.K.S Hellou was waiting on the launchpad.

In the vessel, was three intrepid kerbonauts were getting excited, the first pioneers ever to step foot on another solar system...

Wherming Kerman.

Dilfrey Kerman.

Lemnard Kerman.

It was a cold, silent fifteen seconds before the I.K.S Hellou launched off...

After a handful of minutes, the I.K.S Hellou escaped Kerbin's sphere of influence.

Warp engines engaged....
